name: PETERSON 25 1/4 TON
notes:
The first of several Doug Peterson designed 1/4 tonners were built by Carl Eichenlaub at a mid-west factory.

Other 1/4 ton designs; A very imprecise time line:

1975: Similar and from same molds by Posiedon Marine, some of which were sold as kits.
Also built by Chita Marine. Chaser. Ended up in possession of Bayliner, (US 25).

1976: New design, Star Eyed Stella (4th, Int. 1/4 ton cup of 1976.).

1978: Daggerboard version. SEAWAY 25 (Stephenson Marine in Australia.)

1978: New design. Chita Marine.
1980 ?:  Design for Navimor of Poland (CONRAD 560)
